ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides Tools for Accessing the Botanical Information and Ecology Network Database.  The BIEN database contains cleaned and standardized botanical data including occurrence, trait, plot and taxonomic data (See <https://bien.nceas.ucsb.edu/bien/> for more Information).  This package provides functions that query the BIEN database by constructing and executing optimized SQL queries.

Provides Tools for Accessing the Botanical Information and Ecology Network Database.  The BIEN database contains cleaned and standardized botanical data including occurrence, trait, plot and taxonomic data (See <https://bien.nceas.ucsb.edu/bien/> for more Information).  This package provides functions that query the BIEN database by constructing and executing optimized SQL queries.

name: r-bien
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.2.7" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-bien
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/BIEN_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/BIEN/BIEN_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 37184f0c717f137e2047f28d2d385b23360c606c90384d810dea6c78680b8c61

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dbi
    - r-rpostgresql
    - r-ape
    - r-doparallel
    - r-fasterize
    - r-foreach
    - r-raster
    - r-sf
    - r-terra
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dbi
    - r-rpostgresql
    - r-ape
    - r-doparallel
    - r-fasterize
    - r-foreach
    - r-raster
    - r-sf
    - r-terra

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('BIEN')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('BIEN')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=BIEN
  license: MIT
  summary: Provides Tools for Accessing the Botanical Information and Ecology Network Database.  The BIEN database contains cleaned and standardized botanical data including occurrence, trait, plot and taxonomic data (See <https://bien.nceas.ucsb.edu/bien/> for more Information).  This package provides functions that query
    the BIEN database by constructing and executing optimized SQL queries.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
